title: Technical profile
content:
• Windows based Operating System knowledge up to Windows 7/10/11
  • Html5, CSS 3.0
  • Javascript, jQuery, Underscore, Reactjs, Angular, Vuejs, Nodejs
  • Npmjs, Gruntjs, Gulp, Webpack, Handlebars, SASS, LESS
  • C#, .NET up to 4.0, ASP.NET, ASP.NET MVC 4
  • Web Services, SQL Server up to 2018
  • EPiServer CMS 7.5/9
  • Visual Studio up to 2019, notepad++
  • Design pattern

title: WORK EXPERIENCE
subTitle: [June 2015 â€“ present] .Net Developer,  Researcher, Front-end developer, NITECO VIETNAM
content:
• Work as a developer with AngularJS, Angular, Vuejs, Reactjs, ASP.NET MVC, SQL Server
  • Involve in developing framework projects that support upper level projects, including data manipulating and indexing, server side caching, core components which are reusable by another projects. CDN (content delivery network) integration
  • Participate in development of projects that based on core framework projects: integrating and modifying components so that they fit with the projects' specific requirement, help resolve problems which rose from integration phases.
  • Take responsibility as a mentor, trainer for new members via training programs like: Lunch & Learn, knowledge sharing.
